subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[drill]]; to [[bore]]
# to [[study]] [[intensively]]
# to [[go]] [[deep]] [[into]] or go [[through]]; to [[get]] into; to [[break]] through; to [[pierce]]
# to [[secure]] [[personal]] [[gain]]
